summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2008 FORD EDGE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE FUEL TANK LEAKED A SMALL AMOUNT OF FUEL ONTO THE GROUND. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER WHO STATED THAT THE VEHICLE WAS UNSAFE TO DRIVE. THERE WAS A RECALL ACCORDING TO NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 14V682000 (FUEL SYSTEM, GASOLINE); HOWEVER, THE PART NEEDED TO PERFORM THE REPAIR WAS UNAVAILABLE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE REPAIR. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 99,000.
